  • Method Details

    • isValidString

      public static boolean isValidString(String str)
      Checks if a string is valid.

      A string is considered valid if it is not null, not empty, and not just whitespace after being trimmed.

      Parameters:
      str - the string to check
      Returns:
      true if the string is not null, not empty, and not just whitespace after being trimmed, false otherwise

    • equalsIgnoreCase

      public static boolean equalsIgnoreCase(String str1, String str2)
      Compares two strings ignoring case and whitespace.

      This method checks if two strings are equal after trimming whitespace and ignoring case differences.

      Parameters:
      str1 - the first string to compare
      str2 - the second string to compare
      Returns:
      true if the strings are equal after trimming and ignoring case, false otherwise

    • capitalize

      public static String capitalize(String str)
      Capitalizes the first letter of a string.

      If the input string is null or empty, it is returned unchanged. Otherwise, the first character is converted to uppercase, and the rest of the string remains unchanged.

      Parameters:
      str - the string to capitalize
      Returns:
      the capitalized string

    • isNumeric

      public static boolean isNumeric(String str)
      Checks if a string is numeric.

      A string is considered numeric if it consists only of digits.

      Parameters:
      str - the string to check
      Returns:
      true if the string is numeric, false otherwise

    • isAlphaNumeric

      public static boolean isAlphaNumeric(String str)
      Checks if a string is alphanumeric.

      A string is considered alphanumeric if it consists only of letters and digits.

      Parameters:
      str - the string to check
      Returns:
      true if the string is alphanumeric, false otherwise

    • stringToBoolean

      public static Boolean stringToBoolean(String str)
      Converts a string to a boolean value.

      If the input string is null, this method returns null. Otherwise, it attempts to parse the string as a boolean value, where "true", "True", "TRUE", etc., are considered true, and "false", "False", "FALSE", etc., are considered false. Any other string will result in a null return value.

      Parameters:
      str - the string to convert
      Returns:
      the boolean value of the string, or null if conversion fails

    • stringToInteger

      public static Integer stringToInteger(String str)
      Converts a string to an integer value.

      If the input string is null or empty, this method returns null. Otherwise, it attempts to parse the string as an integer. If parsing fails, this method returns null.

      Parameters:
      str - the string to convert
      Returns:
      the integer value of the string, or null if conversion fails

    • joinString

      public static String joinString(String delimiter, String... elements)
      Joins multiple strings into a single string with a specified delimiter.

      This method concatenates all input strings with the given delimiter in between each string.

      Parameters:
      delimiter - the delimiter to use between strings
      elements - the strings to join
      Returns:
      the joined string

    • normalizeWhitespace

      public static String normalizeWhitespace(String str)
      Normalizes whitespace in a string.

      This method replaces multiple whitespace characters with a single space.

      Parameters:
      str - the string to normalize
      Returns:
      the string with normalized whitespace

    • truncate

      public static String truncate(String str, int length)
      Truncates a string to a specified length.

      If the input string is longer than the specified length, it is truncated to that length. Otherwise, the original string is returned.

      Parameters:
      str - the string to truncate
      length - the maximum length of the string
      Returns:
      the truncated string

    • toCamelCase

      public static String toCamelCase(String str)
      Converts a string to camel case.

      This method splits the input string into words based on whitespace, converts the first word to lowercase, and capitalizes the first letter of each subsequent word.

      Parameters:
      str - the string to convert
      Returns:
      the string in camel case

    • toSnakeCase

      public static String toSnakeCase(String str)
      Converts a string to snake case.

      This method replaces all whitespace characters with underscores and converts the entire string to lowercase.

      Parameters:
      str - the string to convert
      Returns:
      the string in snake case

    • urlEncode

      public static String urlEncode(String str)
      URL encodes a string.

      This method encodes special characters in the input string according to URL encoding rules.

      Parameters:
      str - the string to encode
      Returns:
      the URL-encoded string

    • urlDecode

      public static String urlDecode(String str)
      URL decodes a string.

      This method decodes URL-encoded characters in the input string back to their original form.

      Parameters:
      str - the string to decode
      Returns:
      the URL-decoded string
